backend/main.mo: Main canister defining storage, access control, data types, comparisons, and CRUD logic for users, categories, products, variants, promo codes, customers, and orders.
backend/migration.mo: Migration utility that transforms old categories, products, and orders into the new schema with image blobs, variant support, and updated product/order fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs with high‑confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files including hooks, pages, components, and state modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variable definitions for light and dark modes with color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React router configuration with storefront and admin routes using lazy loading and shared layout components.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminShell: Admin layout with header, sidebar navigation, and logout handling wrapped in an admin route guard.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductIma: UI for adding, previewing, and removing product images via file upload or URL input.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductVar: Editor for creating, updating, and deleting product variants tied to a product ID.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Protects admin routes by checking authentication and admin status, redirecting or showing an access-denied screen.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSpinner.t: Simple spinner component showing a centered animated loading indicator.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Sets page title and meta description dynamically using React effects.
frontend/src/components/site/StorefrontF: Storefront footer with branding, quick links, contact info, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/site/StorefrontH: Responsive storefront header with navigation, cart indicator, auth handling, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/site/StorefrontL: Page layout wrapper that combines the storefront header, footer, and main content.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Order: Displays a customer’s order history with order totals, statuses, dates, and item details including variants.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Produ: Renders selectable product variants, filtering only active and in-stock options for size selection.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Promo: Provides promo code input, validation, and feedback, applying or clearing discounts for an order.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/usePlaceOrd: Mutation hook that creates or fetches a customer and submits a new order, then refreshes related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuth.ts: Authentication-related hooks for admin checks, retrieving and saving the caller’s user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCategories: Category CRUD hooks that fetch, create, update, and delete categories while invalidating cache appropriately.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useOrders.ts: Order-related hooks for fetching orders, updating status, marking as seen, and retrieving customer info.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useProducts.t: Product CRUD and lookup hooks for fetching all products, by category, by id, and creating/updating/deleting products.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/usePromoCodes: React-query hooks for fetching, validating, creating, updating, and deleting promo codes via the actor API with toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useVariants.t: React-query hooks to manage product variants including fetching by product, CRUD operations, and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity loading, and status management using AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClientProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Admin UI for listing, creating, editing, and deleting categories with dialogs, file uploads, and react-query mutations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCustomersP: Fetches all orders, groups them by customer, and displays customer info with order history in an accordion.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Loads order, product, and category stats to render an admin dashboard with metrics and quick actions.
Handles admin authentication via Internet Identity and redirects authorized users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays all orders with filtering, status updates, marking as seen, and CSV export functionality.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Manages creation, editing, and deletion of products with dialogs, category selection, and image/variant editing.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPromoCodes: Manages promo codes including creation, editing, deletion, and activation settings through dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/storefront/AccountPag: Displays the user's account page with profile editing, sign‑in flow, and order history retrieval using various hooks.
frontend/src/pages/storefront/CartPage.t: Shows cart contents, handles quantity updates, promo code discounts, and displays empty‑cart or checkout navigation states.
frontend/src/pages/storefront/CheckoutPa: Implements checkout with form validation, promo handling, order submission, and redirects to confirmation after placing an order.
frontend/src/pages/storefront/ContactPag: Static contact information page with phone, email, location, hours, and a brief description of the brand.
frontend/src/pages/storefront/HomePage.t: Home page displaying hero content and a product grid with quick‑add logic and product previews.
frontend/src/pages/storefront/MenuPage.t: Menu page that loads categories, products, and variants, displays them with filters, and allows adding selected variants to the cart via a modal dialog.
frontend/src/pages/storefront/OrderConfi: Displays order confirmation details using the order ID from the URL and provides navigation back to home or the menu.
frontend/src/state/cartStore.ts: Zustand store managing cart items with add, remove, update, clear, and total calculation functions, persisted in local storage.
frontend/src/state/useCart.ts: Convenience hook that exposes the cart Zustand store.
frontend/src/utils/blob.ts: Utility helpers for converting files and URLs to ExternalBlob objects and generating preview URLs or handling file uploads.
frontend/src/utils/exportOrders.ts: Converts orders to a CSV file using product metadata and triggers a client-side download.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash‑based routing handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending colors, fonts, animations, and container settings, with plugin support for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the current project state for extending the Fal Sarovar app, outlining goals like richer catalog features, Firebase-based architecture, and a list of existing implemented features. Includes summary, architectural notes, and configuration metadata for versioned project tracking.
